name: The Scratchrooms
description:
Hello And Welcome To The Scratchrooms. As You Can Tell By The Title. This Entire Project Was Made On The Scratch Engine.  I'm NOT Planning To Add More Gameplay I Like The Game How It Is. PLEASE Dont Ask.

If You Die Your Gonna Have To Restart The Page If You Win And Somehow You Wanna Play Again Your Gonna Have To Restart The Page. I'll Get This Fixed Soon...

Use The WASD Keys To Move And The Arrow Keys To Look Around. There Is A Time Limit Before You Can Escape Each Level! Collect Almond Water And Escape The Backrooms.

Tip: Almond Water Can Heal You So Be Sure To Collect Them
